title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 3.36 - Nonpublic schools
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 3.36 - Nonpublic schools

State Regulations

The Commissioner of Education, with the approval of the

Regents, shall promulgate regulations relating to the apportionment of funds to
non-public schools pursuant to the provisions of chapter 507 of the Laws of
1974. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
3.36

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
